yearInTaxes.description: Review your annual P&L statement and VAT summary for tax preparation.

uncheckedTransactions.description: Review and categorize your synced transactions to keep your books accurate.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.searchPlaceholder: Search by invoice number or client...
invoices.filteringByClientDesc: Showing invoices for selected client only

new.title: New Invoice
new.profileIncomplete: Please complete your profile before creating invoices.
new.invoiceSettingsMissing: Please configure your invoice settings before creating invoices.

actions.sentError: Failed to mark invoice as sent
actions.paidError: Failed to mark invoice as paid

validation.selectClientAndCategory: Please select a client and category
validation.lineItemsRequired: Please add at least one line item with a description and price greater than 0

delete.title: Delete Client
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.syncedDescription: Review and categorize transactions synced from your bank accounts
transactions.syncedDescriptionEmpty: Transactions synced from your bank accounts will appear here for review and categorization
transactions.discardConfirm: Are you sure you want to discard "{description}"? This action cannot be undone.

import.title: Import Transactions
import.uploadDescription: Click to upload or drag and drop
import.templatesDescription: Use our pre-formatted templates to ensure your data imports correctly. Choose the format that works best for you.
import.csvDescription: Simple text format, compatible with most spreadsheet software
import.excelDescription: Native Excel format with data validation
import.step1Description: Start by downloading either a CSV or Excel template that matches our required format.
import.step2Description: Add your transactions to the template. Use negative amounts for expenses and positive for income.
import.step3Description: Upload your completed file and we'll import your transactions automatically.
import.fileFormatDescription: Your import file must include the following columns:

columnDescriptions.amount: Transaction amount (negative for expenses, positive for income)
columnDescriptions.vatRate: VAT rate applicable to this transaction

upgradeOverlay.title: Upgrade to import transactions
upgradeOverlay.description: Importing transactions is available on Pro and above.

transactions.uncheckedAlert: You have {count} unchecked transactions synced from your bank account(s)
transactions.categorizationAlert: You have {count} transactions that need categorization
transactions.categorizationDescription: Use the edit button to categorize transactions, or the discard button to remove unwanted ones
transactions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{description}"? This action cannot be undone.

bankConnections.title: Bank Connections
bankConnections.subtitle: Sync, update, or connect new accounts easily
bankConnections.syncDisabledTooltip: Sync is only available once every 24 hours
bankConnections.noConnectionsDescription: Connect your bank account to automatically sync transactions
bankConnections.autoSyncBanner: Automatic transaction sync enabled. Your bank connections will automatically retrieve new transactions daily. All data is encrypted and securely stored.

connect.title: Connect Bank Account
connect.headerDescription: Securely connect your bank account to automatically sync transactions. We use bank-level encryption and never store your credentials.
connect.step1Description: Choose your bank from our list of supported institutions.
connect.step2Description: You'll be redirected to your bank's secure login page to authorize the connection.
connect.step3Description: Once connected, your transactions will automatically sync daily.
connect.securityDescription: We prioritize your financial security and privacy. Here's what we do and don't do with your data.
connect.transactionHistoryDesc: Read-only access to your transaction history for the past 90 days
connect.accountDetailsDesc: Basic account information including account name and balance
connect.neverStoreCredentials: Never store your bank login credentials
connect.neverInitiateTransactions: Never initiate any transactions or transfers
connect.neverShareData: Never share your financial data with third parties
connect.neverModifySettings: Never modify your account settings or preferences
connect.termsDisclaimer: By proceeding, you agree to our {terms} and {privacy}. We do not store your banking credentials.

callback.errorDescription: There was an error connecting your bank account. Please try again.
callback.title: Connecting Bank Account
callback.completingDescription: Please wait while we establish a secure connection to your bank...
callback.successDescription: Your bank account has been successfully connected. You can now view and categorize your transactions.

about.title: About Bank Connections
about.security: Your bank credentials are never stored on our servers. We use bank-level encryption.
about.syncFrequency: Transactions are synced automatically every 24 hours. You can manually sync anytime.
about.pauseSync: You can pause sync for any account using the toggle switch without disconnecting.
about.reviewTransactions: All synced transactions appear in the Transactions page for review and categorization.

reports.title: Reports
reports.dataNotAvailableDescription: Some report data is not yet available from the backend. These features will be implemented in a future update.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.addPaymentMethodDescription: Add a payment method to continue your subscription
subscription.flexibleBillingMessage: You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time. Changes take effect at the end of your current billing period.
subscription.addPaymentMethodToSubscribe: Please add a payment method first to change your plan
subscription.planChangeNotAllowed: This plan change is not allowed
subscription.planChangeFailed: Failed to change plan. Please try again.

bankDetails.title: Bank Account Details
bankDetails.description: These details will appear on your invoices

elsterCertificate.title: Elster Certificate
elsterCertificate.description: Upload your .p12 or .pfx certificate file for Elster integration

email.title: Email Notifications
email.invoiceSentDesc: Get notified when an invoice is sent to a client
email.invoicePaidDesc: Get notified when an invoice is marked as paid
email.invoiceOverdueDesc: Get notified when an invoice becomes overdue
email.newClientDesc: Get notified when a new client is added

vatReminders.title: VAT & Tax Reminders
vatReminders.declarationDueDesc: Remind me 7 days before VAT declaration is due
vatReminders.declarationSubmittedDesc: Confirm when VAT declaration is successfully submitted
vatReminders.taxYearEndDesc: Remind me 30 days before tax year end

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
twoFactor.enableDesc: Require authentication code in addition to password

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your active sessions across different devices.

accountManagement.title: Account Management
accountManagement.description: For data export, account deletion, and privacy settings, please visit the {privacy} tab.

complianceStatus.title: GDPR/DSGVO Compliance Status
complianceStatus.description: Your account is configured to meet GDPR and DSGVO requirements

consentManagement.title: Consent Management
consentManagement.description: Manage your consent for data processing activities

essential.title: Essential Data Processing
essential.description: Required to provide core accounting services

analytics.title: Analytics & Performance
analytics.description: Help us improve the application with usage data

marketing.title: Marketing Communications
marketing.description: Receive product updates and feature announcements

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Integrations
thirdParty.description: Allow data sharing with approved third-party services

dataRights.title: Your Data Rights (GDPR/DSGVO)
dataRights.description: Exercise your rights under the General Data Protection Regulation

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: Download all your data in a machine-readable format

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: View all personal data we have stored about you

erasure.title: Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten")
erasure.description: Request permanent deletion of all your personal data

dataRetention.title: Data Retention & Processing
dataRetention.retentionNote: Note: German tax law requires 10 years retention for accounting records
dataRetention.processingNote: Your data will only be processed in these locations

clientProcessing.title: Client Data Processing
clientProcessing.description: As you process client data in this application, you act as a data controller under GDPR

consentTracking.title: Automatic Client Consent Tracking
consentTracking.description: Track GDPR consent for client data processing

deletionRequests.title: Client Data Deletion Requests
deletionRequests.description: Enable clients to request data deletion

dpo.title: Data Protection Officer (DPO)
dpo.description: Contact information for data protection inquiries

breachNotification.title: Data Breach Notification
breachNotification.description: Configure how you want to be notified in case of a data breach (GDPR Article 33)

sms.title: SMS Notification
sms.description: Receive SMS alerts for critical breaches

breachNotification.emergencyNote: Secondary contact for data breach notifications

auditLog.title: Privacy Audit Log
auditLog.description: Track all privacy-related activities for GDPR compliance

dataExport.title: Export Your Data
dataExport.description: Download a copy of all your data stored in Solobooks

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
deleteAccount.warning: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
